attributes.action: To have less hours in schools
attributes.additional_details: Because when we come home we’re so tired that we want to sleep and we can’t spend time with family
attributes.background: To change the hours from 7 to 6 or 5 hours so we can spend more time with family

rejection.details:
We understand you want schools to be open for fewer hours, however it's not clear whether you want this to apply to primary schools, secondary schools, or both. It's also not clear whether you want the school day to be reduced to 6 hours or 5.

You may wish to sign these petitions which call for very similar actions:

Limit secondary schools days to 5.5 hours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612366

Review school start times in line with the needs of adolescents: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612650
